definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: Christopher Marlowe is one of the outstanding representatives of English Renaissance dramatists.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托弗馬洛是文藝復興時期英國戲劇的傑出代表。

sentences.english: That Later Renaissance is a complicated historical term. W. J.
sentences.chinese: 後期文藝復興是一個比較複雜的史學概念。

sentences.english: At first the artists of the Renaissance only had single-point perspective.
sentences.chinese: 一開始，文藝復興時期的畫家們只會運用單點透視。

sentences.english: Neoplatonism was one of the important thoughts of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 新柏拉圖主義是文藝復興時期重要思想之一。

sentences.english: The Renaissance and Humanism: Humanism is the key-note of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 文藝復興，提倡理性，人文主義。

sentences.english: Then the rediscovery of Western culture in Europe in the Late Middle Ages prompted the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 西方文化復興於文藝復興繁榮的中世紀晚期。

sentences.english: Perspective was invented during the Italian Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法是在意大利文藝復興期間發明的。

sentences.english: The third part is about the historical analysis of human rights in the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分文藝復興時期人權思想的歷史淺析淺析。

sentences.english: As a type of painting, self-portrait came into being in the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 自畫像作爲一個畫種在文藝復興時期誕生了。

sentences.english: The first European travellers during the Renaissance found it much as it is today.
sentences.chinese: 第一個文藝復興期時的歐洲旅者找到的就和今天一樣。

sentences.english: Can Singapore be a renai ance city?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡能成爲文藝復興城市嗎？

sentences.english: How will they use Renaissance-era technology?It's an answer I'm excited to see.
sentences.chinese: 他們將如何利用文藝復興時期的技術呢？

sentences.english: In the Renaissance period the nobility wore elaborate and brightly colored dresses.
sentences.chinese: 在文藝復興時期，貴族們都熱衷於精美鮮亮的裙裝。

sentences.english: The intent was to reflect a Renaissance-like mood on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 它只是相反應文藝復興，在封面上表示一種情緒。

sentences.english: Later, during the Renaissance, Rome became a mecca for artists of all kinds.
sentences.chinese: 之後，羅馬在文藝復興時期成了各派藝術家的聖地。

sentences.english: European Renaissance Age is a great changeable age.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲文藝復興時代是一個偉大的變革時代。
